Description:
This resource is intended for organizations in the Netherlands only.

The ImmunizationRecommendation resource communicates which immunizations are recommended for a specified patient based on their current immunization orders. This resource includes information about only recommended immunizations, not administered or refused immunizations.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: The patient associated with the immunization recommendation. Reference to the Patient resource.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

date.Name: date
date.Description: The date when the immunization recommendation was created.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: The patient associated with the immunization recommendation. Reference to the Patient resource.

dateCriterion.Name: dateCriterion
dateCriterion.Description: The date when the recommended immunization is considered due or overdue.

code.Name: code
code.Description: Whether a date value is considered the due date or the overdue date.

value.Name: value
value.Description: The date when the immunization is considered due or overdue.

forecastStatus.Name: forecastStatus
forecastStatus.Description: The status of the immunization recommendation. Returns due or overdue.

vaccineCode.Name: vaccineCode
vaccineCode.Description: The code and product name for the recommended immunization.

coding.Name: coding
coding.Description: The vaccine code for the recommended immunization. Includes GPK, HPK, and PRK codes.

text.Name: text
text.Description: The name of the recommended immunization.
